description: Charred lamb is always a winner, and when it's perfectly paired with a pumpkin salad drizzled with maple, it makes a tasty yet simple family dinner.
keywords: Charred Lamb & Pumpkin Salad With Maple Dressing
name: Charred Lamb & Pumpkin Salad with Maple Dressing Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place syrup, oil and lemon juice in a small bowl and whisk to combine. Arrange pumpkin, capsicum and spinach on a platter, drizzle over dressing and toss to combine. Season with pepper. Arrange lamb over salad and serve scattered with almonds.
